aboutMePhrase: As a recent graduate in Web Development, I'm passionate about creating impactful, user-centered websites and applications. I have developed a solid foundation in back-end and front-end technologies.

studies1.title: Higher Technician in Digital design and Web Development.
studies1.description: I've learn the use of basic developing lenguages and developed some projects in this area. Mostly worked with Java adn Spring Boot, with MySQL DB and HTML, CSS and JS. Also worked with Git and Github and deploying in Azure.

studies2.title: University degree in Stage Design and Scenography Technology.
studies2.description: Spend 4 years designing and working in groups for different theater proyects, with a strong focus on design, production and team management
studies2.date: Escuela Superior de Arte Dramático  de Sevilla (2017-2022)

studies3.title: French language medium level
studies3.description: Studied French language at the Instituto de Idiomas de la Universidad de Sevilla for several months and reached a B2 level.
studies3.date: Instituto de Idiomas de la Universidad de Sevilla (2021)

work1.title: NTTDATA Internship
work1.description: Spent 3 months as a NTTDATA Dual Intern with the role of Junior Web Developer.

work2.title: Veganitessen Crew Leader
work2.description: Worked as a Veganitessen Crew Leader at the university.

reference1.title: Jose Alberto Martinez
reference1.description: Jefe en el departamento de diseño de la escena

success-message: Thanks for your message! I'll get back to you ASAP.
